dmca.title: DMCA (Copyright) Complaint to The Planet
dmca.body:
To Whom It May Concern:

 

Please note that below-referenced copyright infringement notice does not
substantially comply with the required notification elements of the
Digital Millennium Copyright Act of 1998 ("DMCA").

 

Please note that we have not passed on the substantive merits of your
claim.

 

Please visit our web site at www.ev1servers.net/About/dmca.aspx
<http://www.ev1servers.net/About/dmca.aspx> 

 

Legal Response Team


________________________________

From: Mehrdad [mailto:[redacted]@caltexrecords.com] 
Posted At: Thursday, October 26, 2006 4:36 PM
Posted To: DMCA Houston
Conversation: Abuse complaint regarding the server located at
[66.98.249.6] Gohardasht.org Case Number: 10184
Subject: Re: Abuse complaint regarding the server located at
[66.98.249.6] Gohardasht.org Case Number: 10184


Would you please advise us of status of our complain for following
infringements:
 
1-    30metri.com
2-    music.tirip.com
3-    parsima.com
 
Regards,
Mehrdad
 
----- Original Message ----- 

        From: Mehrdad <mailto:[redacted]@caltexrecords.com>  
        To: Everyones Internet DMCA Agent <mailto:[redacted]@ev1.net>  
        Cc: [redacted]@ev1servers.net ; [redacted]@ev1servers.ner 
        Sent: Thursday, October 26, 2006 8:53 AM
        Subject: Re: Abuse complaint regarding the server located at
[66.98.249.6] Gohardasht.org Case Number: 10184

        We are happy to hear the mentioned illegal site "Gohardash.Org"
has removed our copyrighted material.
         
        But there are the following sites that still are carrying our
copyrighted materials:
         
        1-    30metri.com
        2-    music.tirip.com
        3-    parsima.com
         
        These site not only are illegally using our products, BUT they
do offer our record companies such as Taraneh, Pars Video and Avang,
which those companies have already started their process.
         
        I can help you to stop any legal actions by you if all of our
materials are removed by tomorrow.
         
        I thank you again supporting these copyright matters.
         
        Best regards,
        Mehrdad
         
         
         
         
        ----- Original Message ----- 
        From: "Everyones Internet DMCA Agent" <[redacted]@ev1.net
<mailto:[redacted]@ev1.net> >
        To: <[redacted]@caltexrecords.com
<mailto:[redacted]@caltexrecords.com> >
        Sent: Thursday, October 26, 2006 6:59 AM
        Subject: Abuse complaint regarding the server located at
[66.98.249.6] Gohardasht.org Case Number: 10184
        
        
        > Your Reference Number: Gohardasht.org
        > Our Case Number: 10184
        > 
        > 
        > , , . 
        > 
        > Sir, 
        > 
        > We feel that the user in question in this violation has
successfully removed the material in question regarding the abuse
complaint and have closed the case in our records, as of 10/26/2006
8:59:04 AM. 
        > 
        > The offending URL(S) was:  Gohardasht.org. If you have any
questions, please contact us at [redacted]@ev1servers.net
<mailto:[redacted]@ev1servers.net>  and [redacted]@ev1servers.net
<mailto:[redacted]@ev1servers.net> .   Referencing 10184
        > 
        > -- 
        > 
        > Regards,
        > Abuse Team
        > EV1Servers.net
        > [redacted]@ev1servers.net <mailto:[redacted]@ev1servers.net> 
        >
